tool.name: tool_6

param.name: MODE
param.dialogReference:
Neighbourhood

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Neumann

[1] Moore

Default: 1

Neumann: the four horizontally and vertically neighboured cells; Moore: all eight adjacent cells

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Value

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] arithmetic mean

[1] median

[2] majority

[3] minority

Default: 0

tool.summary: Closes one cell gaps using the arithmetic mean, median, majority or minority value of the surrounding cell values. If the target is not set, the changes will be stored to the original grid.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
